    • starterCardFacingChoice

      public void starterCardFacingChoice(StarterCard sc, Symbol gt, Symbol rt, GoldCard g1, GoldCard g2, ResourceCard r1, ResourceCard r2)
      Method that prints both faces of a StarterCard to show to the Player so that they can choose
      Specified by:
      starterCardFacingChoice in interface Viewable
      Parameters:
      sc - the StarterCard drawn by the Player
      gt - a Symbol variable representing the color of the card on top of the gold deck
      rt - a Symbol variable representing the color of the card on top of the resource deck
      g1 - the first face-up GoldCard available to be drawn
      g2 - the second face-up GoldCard available to be drawn
      r1 - the first face-up ResourceCard available to be drawn
      r2 - the second face-up ResourceCard available to be drawn

    • personalObjectiveChoice

      public void personalObjectiveChoice(Symbol topG, Symbol topR, String nickname, HashMap<String,Color> pc, HashMap<String,String[]> hcc, HashMap<String,StarterCard> psc, LinkedList<PlayableCard> ownHand, ObjectiveCard sharedObj1, ObjectiveCard sharedObj2, ObjectiveCard objChoice1, ObjectiveCard objChoice2, HashMap<String,VisibleElements> pve)
      Prints all infos a Player has during his Personal Objective Choice
      Specified by:
      personalObjectiveChoice in interface Viewable
      Parameters:
      pc - each Player's nickname and color
      hcc - each Player's Hand Cards Colors
      psc - each Player's StarterCard (only the facing chosen by the owner of the StarterCard will be shown)
      ownHand - this Player's Cards in Hand
      sharedObj1 - the first Objective shared by all Players
      sharedObj2 - the second Objective shared by all Players
      objChoice1 - first Objective this Player can choose from
      objChoice2 - second Objective this Player can choose from

    • updateOtherPlayerDraw

      public void updateOtherPlayerDraw(String nickname, GoldCard gfu1, GoldCard gfu2, ResourceCard rfu1, ResourceCard rfu2, Symbol gtc, Symbol rtc, String[] hcc)
      Method used to update the game screen with all the information changed after an opponent draws a card
      Specified by:
      updateOtherPlayerDraw in interface Viewable
      Parameters:
      nickname - a String containing the name of the Player who drew a card
      gfu1 - GoldCard face up 1
      gfu2 - GoldCard face up 2
      rfu1 - ResourceCard face up 1
      rfu2 - ResourceCard face up 2
      gtc - Symbol of the card on top of the GoldDeck
      rtc - Symbol of the card on top of the ResourceDeck
      hcc - array of Strings containing the Hand cards colors

    • reconnectionInitialSetter

      public void reconnectionInitialSetter(String ownNick, ObjectiveCard shObj1, ObjectiveCard shObj2, ObjectiveCard pObj, Symbol gt, Symbol rt, GoldCard g1, GoldCard g2, ResourceCard r1, ResourceCard r2, LinkedList<PlayableCard> cardsInHand, HashMap<String,PlayerDisconnectionResendInfo> pdr)
      method used to set everything
      Specified by:
      reconnectionInitialSetter in interface Viewable
      Parameters:
      ownNick - the nickname of this Client
      shObj1 - ObjectiveCard representing the first shared objective
      shObj2 - ObjectiveCard representing the second shared objective
      pObj - ObjectiveCard representing the player's personal objective
      gt - Symbol representing the top of the gold deck
      rt - Symbol representing the top of the resource deck
      g1 - GoldCard face-up number 1
      g2 - GoldCard face-up number 2
      r1 - ResourceCard face-up number 1
      r2 - ResourceCard face-up number 2
      cardsInHand - List of PlayableCard representing the hand of this Player
      pdr - a Map with each Player's nickname as key (String) and a PlayerDisconnectionResendInfo as value, containing all the information needed
